Health Ministry
 

     Combining medical missionary work and ministry of the Word, we can reach all classes.--The gospel ministry is an organization for the proclamation of the truth to the sick and to the well. It combines the medical missionary work and the ministry of the Word. By these combined agencies opportunities are given to communicate light and to present the gospel to
119
all classes and all grades of society. God wants the ministers and the church members to take a decided, active interest in the medical missionary work.--6T 300, 301.
